GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT CS_PERIOD.NAME AS NAME, CS_PERIOD.STARTDATE AS STARTDATE, CS_PERIOD.ENDDATE AS ENDDATE FROM CS_PERIOD WHERE CS_PERIOD.PERIODTYPESEQ IN (SELECT PERIODTYPESEQ FROM CS_PERIODTYPE WHERE NAME = 'quarter' ) AND CS_PERIOD.calendarseq IN (SELECT calendarseq FROM cs_calendar WHERE upper(name)='AIA SINGAPORE CALENDAR' )

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT IN_ST_PAQPB.DEC_RECORD_NO, IN_ST_PAQPB.DEC_ADJ_YEAR, IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_ADJ_QUARTER, IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_COMP_CD, IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_AGENT_CD, IN_ST_PAQPB.DEC_ADJ_FYP, IN_ST_PAQPB.DEC_ADJ_RYP, IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_USER_ID, IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_REMARK, IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_ERROR_MSG, IN_ETL_CONTROL.TXT_KEY_STRING, IN_ETL_CONTROL.TXT_FILE_NAME, IN_ETL_CONTROL.TXT_KEY_VALUE FROM IN_ST_PAQPB, IN_ETL_CONTROL WHERE IN_ETL_CONTROL.DEC_RUNNING_FLG='1' AND IN_ETL_CONTROL.TXT_KEY_STRING = '$$STR_PAQPB_CYCLE_DATE' --Add for keep record from User 20140702 by ada AND IN_ST_PAQPB.TXT_FLAG='S'

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF((DEC_ADJ_FYP=0 AND DEC_ADJ_RYP=0 ) OR (ISNULL(DEC_ADJ_FYP) AND ISNULL(DEC_ADJ_RYP)),'the adjustment FYP and RYP is null ; ','')|| IIF(NOT IN(TXT_COMP_CD,'2','4','SG','BN') ,'company code not in (2,4,SG,BN) ; ','')|| IIF(:LKP.LKP_QUARTER_NAME(TO_DATE(TXT_CYCLE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))=TXT_ADJ_QUARTER||' '||TO_CHAR(DEC_ADJ_YEAR),'','year and quarter do not match the cycle date; ')|| IIF(ISNULL(BU_NAME),'can not find BU ;','')|| IIF(ISNULL(POS_NAME),'can not find agent position ;','')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: O_TXT_ERROR_MSG

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
Post SQL
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
UPDATE IN_ETL_CONTROL SET TXT_KEY_VALUE = (SELECT LPAD(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)), 10, '0') FROM IN_ST_PAQPB WHERE TXT_ERROR_MSG IS NOT NULL AND TXT_ERROR_MSG <> '1'), DTE_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE TXT_KEY_STRING = 'PAQPB_STAGE_RECORD_COUNT' and DEC_RUNNING_FLG = '1';
COMMIT;
